about_the_game:
In Hero World, you embark on an exciting adventure to help Tom rescue his sister Lisa. She has been abducted by an unknown force, and now it is up to Tom to free her from the clutches of the unknown. Tom must prove himself in various levels. He must overcome easy and difficult obstacles to get closer to his sister. As Tom gets closer to his sister, the challenges become increasingly demanding. The journey will not be easy, but with patience and calmness, Tom can save his sister Lisa and be celebrated as a hero.


Character Description:

In Hero World, you have the freedom to choose which character you want to play with. However, some heroes are locked at the beginning of the game and need to be unlocked. You can purchase them by collecting enough coins, or if you complete the story, you can unlock three additional characters. It is therefore possible to have more heroes available after completing the main story.


Level Description:

In every level of the game, three stars must be collected to successfully complete it. If you don't collect all three stars, you have to repeat the level. Additionally, you can find coins in every level. These coins can be used not only to unlock new characters, but also to refill your lives (attempts/respawns) in the shop. Lives are crucial to progress in the game. If you have used up all your lives (attempts/respawns), you cannot restart the current level. Instead, you start at a checkpoint that is located every tenth level. If you have used up all your attempts, you cannot start in the current level anymore, but will be reset to the previous checkpoint. To continue, you have to repeat all previous levels until you get back to the level where you previously failed. To avoid this, the shops are placed every 5 levels between checkpoints. There you can refresh your lives (attempts/respawns) to progress in the game.


Game Modes:
  • Tutorial Mode
  • Story Mode
  • Challenge Mode

highlighted.name: The Adventure Will Not Be Easy
Half The Adventure Is Already Done

There you can refresh your lives (attempts/respawns) to progress in the game.

  • Challenge Mode
name: Hero World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i5-2500K@3.3GHz or AMD FX 6300@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 780 (3 GB) or AMD Radeon R9 290 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: Only Windows supported | 64 Bit
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core i7-8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080TI
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: None
  • Additional Notes: Only Windows supported | 64 Bit

short_description: You've always wanted to be a hero, and now's your time. Help Tom save his sister Lisa and prove yourself as a hero. It's up to you to rescue Lisa. Are you brave enough to accept the challenge and save her in Hero World?
